events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago and the package still hasn't arrived. The tracking number doesn't show any recent updates, and I'm getting worried about the delay.
The customer's complaint regarding the shipping delay has been reviewed and assigned to the Delivery Delay cluster for further handling.
A customer support agent from the delivery team has been assigned to investigate the reported late shipment issue and respond accordingly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order delay. I’m here to help and will do my best to resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide the order number and the tracking ID you received so I can look into the shipping status in detail?
Sure, my order number is 856732 and the tracking ID is TRK123456789. I haven’t seen any updates for several days now.
Thank you for the information. We have contacted the courier, and it appears there was a delay due to weather conditions. Your package is expected to be delivered within the next three days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate the explanation and hope it arrives soon. Please keep me informed if there are any further issues.
We consider this delivery delay issue resolved based on the updated delivery timeline. We will keep monitoring the shipment until you confirm receipt.
Just following up to ensure your order arrived as expected. Please let us know if you have received the package or need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the package today. Everything is in good condition. Thanks for your help and prompt responses!
We are closing this case as your delivery issue has been successfully resolved. Thank you for your patience and for contacting customer support.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience. We would appreciate your feedback to help us improve.
